h1: How Many Calories Are in a Shot of Fireball?

disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pour size, brand formulation, and serving temperature. Alcoholic content affects values; consult labels or manufacturer data.

quick_answer.text: A standard shot of Fireball contains about 108 calories, primarily from alcohol and added sugars.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a shot of Fireball?
faqs.a: Approximately 108 calories for a standard 1.5 fl oz shot.

faqs.q: Does Fireball have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 11 g carbs and 11 g sugars per shot, from added cinnamon flavoring.
